levelName: 英文單字認讀成長級(六)

examples.english: Our class will visit the Taipei Zoo next Friday.
examples.chinese: 我們班下週五將參觀臺北動物園。

examples.english: I will definitely help you with your science project.
examples.chinese: 我將絕對會幫你完成你的科學專案。

examples.english: He will surely succeed if he works hard.
examples.chinese: 如果他努力，他將一定會成功。

examples.english: She used her new camera to capture beautiful memories.
examples.chinese: 她用她的新照相機捕捉美好的回憶。

examples.english: My smartphone has a great camera for taking selfies.
examples.chinese: 我的智慧型手機有一個很棒的照相機可以拍自拍照。

examples.english: We bought a disposable camera for our camping trip.
examples.chinese: 我們為露營旅行買了一台即可拍相機。

examples.english: My dad listens to the news on the radio every morning.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸每天早上都用收音機聽新聞。

examples.english: This new song is playing on the radio a lot these days.
examples.chinese: 這首新歌最近在廣播電台很常播放。

examples.english: The lost hiker radioed for help from the mountain.
examples.chinese: 迷路的登山客從山上用無線電求救。

examples.english: The washing machine helps us clean clothes quickly.
examples.chinese: 洗衣機幫助我們快速洗淨衣服。

examples.english: A computer is a powerful machine for work and games.
examples.chinese: 電腦是一種用於工作和遊戲的強大機器。

examples.english: This vending machine sells drinks and snacks.
examples.chinese: 這台自動販賣機販售飲料和零食。

examples.english: I found an old music tape in my drawer.
examples.chinese: 我在抽屜裡找到一卷舊錄音帶。

examples.english: The teacher played a short English tape for us.
examples.chinese: 老師放了一段短的英文錄音帶給我們聽。

examples.english: You can record your voice on this blank tape.
examples.chinese: 你可以在這捲空白錄音帶上錄下你的聲音。

examples.english: I taught myself how to draw anime characters.
examples.chinese: 我自己學會了怎麼畫動漫人物。

examples.english: I painted my room myself, it was a lot of work.
examples.chinese: 我的房間是我自己漆的，那真是個大工程。

examples.english: I need to push myself to improve my English skills.
examples.chinese: 我需要督促自己來提升我的英文能力。

examples.english: It's important that you try to finish this difficult task by yourself.
examples.chinese: 重要的是，你應該試著自己完成這個困難的任務。

examples.english: I hope you enjoy yourself at the party tonight.
examples.chinese: 我希望你今晚在派對玩得開心。

examples.english: You should always believe in yourself and never give up.
examples.chinese: 你應該永遠相信自己，永不放棄。

examples.english: Please help yourselves to the snacks on the table.
examples.chinese: 請自己拿取桌上的點心。

examples.english: You yourselves must decide what is best for your future.
examples.chinese: 你們自己必須決定什麼對你們的未來最好。

examples.english: Can you finish the project yourselves by tomorrow?
examples.chinese: 你們明天可以自己完成這個專案嗎？

examples.english: He accidentally hurt himself while playing basketball.
examples.chinese: $他打籃球時不小心傷到自己。

examples.english: Even though it was difficult, he finished the project himself.
examples.chinese: $即使很困難，他還是自己完成了那個專案。

examples.english: He preferred to study by himself in the quiet library.
examples.chinese: $他比較喜歡一個人在安靜的圖書館裡讀書。

examples.english: She taught herself to play the guitar after school.
examples.chinese: 放學後，她自己學會了彈吉他。

examples.english: The famous singer herself appeared on stage to greet fans.
examples.chinese: 那位知名歌手她自己親自上台向粉絲致意。

examples.english: She finished the whole report all by herself without any help.
examples.chinese: 她自己一個人完成了整份報告，沒有任何人的幫助。

examples.english: The cat licked itself clean.
examples.chinese: 這隻貓把自己舔乾淨了。

examples.english: The city itself is beautiful, but the traffic is bad.
examples.chinese: 這城市本身很美，但交通很糟。

examples.english: The dog can open the door by itself.
examples.chinese: 這隻狗可以自己開門。

examples.english: We saw ourselves in the old photo.
examples.chinese: 我們在舊照片中看到了自己。

examples.english: We cleaned the whole classroom ourselves after school.
examples.chinese: 放學後，我們自己打掃了整個教室。

examples.english: We learned to solve the problem by ourselves.
examples.chinese: 我們學會了自己解決問題。

examples.english: The students really enjoyed themselves at the school party.
examples.chinese: 學生們在學校派對上玩得很開心。

examples.english: The children themselves decorated the classroom for the festival.
examples.chinese: 孩子們自己裝飾了教室來慶祝節日。

examples.english: They had to solve the difficult math problem by themselves.
examples.chinese: 他們必須自己解決那個困難的數學問題。

examples.english: The reporter used a small recorder to capture the important interview.
examples.chinese: 記者用一個小錄音機來錄下重要的採訪。

examples.english: A flight recorder can help investigators understand plane accidents.
examples.chinese: 飛行記錄器可以幫助調查員了解飛機事故。

examples.english: Many students learn to play the recorder in elementary music class.
examples.chinese: 許多學生在小學音樂課上學習吹直笛。

examples.english: My grandpa keeps old family videos in a box.
examples.chinese: 我爺爺把舊家庭錄影帶收在盒子裡。

examples.english: We watched an educational video about the rainforest.
examples.chinese: 我們看了一段關於雨林的教育錄影帶。

examples.english: The video quality of this old movie is poor.
examples.chinese: 這部老電影的錄影品質很差。

examples.english: What is the price of this cool new video game?
examples.chinese: 這款超酷的新電玩遊戲的價錢是多少？

examples.english: We got a good price for the new bicycle during the sale.
examples.chinese: 我們在特賣會上以優惠的價錢買到了新腳踏車。

examples.english: If you don't practice hard, you will pay the price later.
examples.chinese: 如果你不努力練習，以後就會付出代價。

examples.english: The total for all the books was NT$500.
examples.chinese: 所有書本的總計是新台幣五百元。

examples.english: After the rain, we saw a total rainbow in the sky.
examples.chinese: 下雨後，我們在天空中看見了完整的彩虹。

examples.english: My scores for the three tests totaled 270 points.
examples.chinese: 我三次考試的總分總計達270分。

examples.english: This juicy watermelon is perfect for a hot summer day.
examples.chinese: 這多汁的西瓜非常適合炎熱的夏天。

examples.english: Sharing a big watermelon with friends is always fun.
examples.chinese: 和朋友一起分享大西瓜總是很有趣。

examples.english: Watermelon is a healthy fruit that helps keep you hydrated.
examples.chinese: 西瓜是一種健康的、能幫助你保持水分的水果。

examples.english: Many people enjoy eating ripe papaya because it is sweet and healthy.

examples.chinese: 很多人喜歡吃成熟的木瓜，因為它又甜又健康。

examples.english: My mom often makes a delicious papaya milk shake.

examples.chinese: 我媽媽經常做美味的木瓜牛奶。

examples.english: Eating papaya can help you get lots of vitamins.

examples.chinese: 吃木瓜可以幫助你攝取很多維他命。

examples.english: I like to add a slice of lemon to my water for a fresh taste.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡在水裡加一片檸檬，讓它喝起來更清爽。

examples.english: Her new dress was a bright lemon yellow, perfect for summer.
examples.chinese: 她的新洋裝是亮檸檬黃，非常適合夏天。

examples.english: The used car he bought turned out to be a lemon, always breaking down.
examples.chinese: 他買的那輛二手車結果是個爛貨，總是故障。

examples.english: Many people in Taiwan enjoy eating fresh guava.台灣很多人喜歡吃新鮮的芭樂。
Guava juice is a popular and refreshing drink.芭樂汁是很受歡迎又清爽的飲料。
Guava is known for being rich in Vitamin C, which is good for your health.芭樂以富含維他命C聞名，對你的健康很有益。
Excuse me, sir, you dropped your wallet on the floor.
examples.chinese: 打擾了，先生，您的皮夾掉在地上了。

examples.english: Sir, may I ask a question about today's homework?
examples.chinese: 老師，請問我可以問一個關於今天作業的問題嗎？

examples.english: Yes, sir, I will follow your instructions right away.
examples.chinese: 是的，先生，我會立刻遵照您的指示。

examples.english: Dr. Lin quickly examined the patient and prescribed medicine.
examples.chinese: 林醫生很快地檢查了病人並開了藥。

examples.english: Dr. Wang teaches history at the university.
examples.chinese: 王博士在大學教歷史。

examples.english: You should see a doctor if you don't feel well.
examples.chinese: 如果你不舒服，就應該去看醫生。

examples.english: My new neighbor introduced herself to us yesterday. 我們的新鄰居昨天向我們介紹了她自己。
We often share fruits and vegetables with our neighbors. 我們經常和我們的鄰居分享水果和蔬菜。
Please ask your neighbor if he needs any help. 請問你的鄰居他是否需要任何幫助。
Children love to go on an Easter egg hunt.
examples.chinese: 孩子們喜歡去玩復活節尋蛋遊戲。

examples.english: Colorful eggs and cute bunnies are popular at Easter.
examples.chinese: 五顏六色的彩蛋和可愛的兔子在復活節很受歡迎。

examples.english: My family always has a big dinner on Easter Sunday.
examples.chinese: 我的家人總是在復活節星期天吃一頓豐盛的晚餐。

examples.english: She put fresh apples and oranges into the picnic basket.
examples.chinese: 她把新鮮的蘋果和柳橙放進野餐籃裡。

examples.english: He jumped high and made a perfect shot into the basket.
examples.chinese: 他跳得很高，然後完美地投籃入網。

examples.english: Please put your dirty clothes in the laundry basket.
examples.chinese: 請把你的髒衣服放進洗衣籃裡。

examples.english: The old church has beautiful stained-glass windows.
examples.chinese: 這座古老的教堂有美麗的彩繪玻璃窗。

examples.english: We go to church every Sunday to pray and sing.
examples.chinese: 我們每個星期天去教堂禱告和唱歌。

examples.english: The local church organizes many charity events for the community.
examples.chinese: 當地教會為社區舉辦許多慈善活動。

examples.english: They went to the forest to hunt for wild animals.
examples.chinese: 他們去森林裡打獵野生動物。

examples.english: I always hunt for bargains when I go shopping.
examples.chinese: 我購物時總是尋找便宜貨。

examples.english: We had to hunt down the specific book for our project.
examples.chinese: 我們必須找到我們專案所需的特定書籍。

examples.english: The red ball rolled quickly down the grassy hill.
examples.chinese: 紅色的球快速地滾下長滿草的山坡。

examples.english: Our dog loves to roll around happily on the soft grass.
examples.chinese: 我們的狗喜歡高興地在柔軟的草地上打滾。

examples.english: Suddenly, thunder began to roll loudly across the sky.
examples.chinese: 突然間，雷聲開始響亮地在天空中滾動。

examples.english: She will hang the new painting on the wall.濕衣服在太陽下掛在繩子上。
examples.chinese: 她會把新畫掛在牆上。

examples.english: Wet clothes hang on the line in the sun.
examples.chinese: 濕衣服在太陽下掛在繩子上。

examples.english: Please don't hang up the phone yet.
examples.chinese: 請先不要掛電話。

examples.english: I usually eat fruit as a healthy snack, especially in the afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我通常會把水果當作健康的點心，尤其是在下午。

examples.english: You shouldn't snack much if you want to stay healthy.
examples.chinese: 如果你想保持健康，就不應該吃太多零食。

examples.english: Many kids love to eat crunchy snacks while watching TV.
examples.chinese: 很多小孩喜歡一邊看電視一邊吃脆脆的零食。

examples.english: He used a special tool to fix the bicycle chain.
examples.chinese: 他用一個特殊的工具修理自行車鏈條。

examples.english: A dictionary is an essential tool for English learners.
examples.chinese: 字典是英語學習者不可或缺的工具。

examples.english: Computers are powerful tools for studying and doing projects.
examples.chinese: 電腦是學習和完成專案的強大工具。

examples.english: She often writes a long letter to her cousin in Japan.
examples.chinese: 她經常寫一封長信給她在日本的表親。

examples.english: Can you spell your name, letter by letter, please?
examples.chinese: 你能一個字母一個字母地拼出你的名字嗎？

examples.english: She was so happy when she received a handwritten letter from her friend.
examples.chinese: 當她收到朋友的一封手寫信時，她非常開心。

examples.english: She put the birthday card into a colorful envelope and mailed it.
examples.chinese: 她把生日卡片放進一個彩色的信封裡，然後寄出。

examples.english: My mom gave me an envelope with some pocket money for the trip.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽給我一個信封，裡面裝著我旅行的零用錢。

examples.english: Remember to write the full address clearly on the front of the envelope.
examples.chinese: 記得要在信封正面清楚地寫上完整的地址。

examples.english: The leaves covered the ground after the heavy rain.
examples.chinese: 大雨過後，樹葉覆蓋了地面。

examples.english: The dog dug a small hole in the soft ground.
examples.chinese: 狗狗在柔軟的地面挖了一個小洞。

examples.english: They plan to clear the ground and build a new school.
examples.chinese: 他們計畫清理這塊地面，建造一所新學校。

examples.english: The R.O.C. celebrates Double Tenth Day as its national holiday every October.
examples.chinese: 中華民國每年十月慶祝雙十節作為國慶日。

examples.english: Before 1971, the R.O.C. officially represented China at the United Nations.
examples.chinese: 在1971年之前，中華民國正式代表中國在聯合國。

examples.english: A passport issued by the R.O.C. allows visa-free entry to many countries.
examples.chinese: 由中華民國核發的護照允許免簽證進入許多國家。

examples.english: The world has many beautiful places and different cultures to explore.
examples.chinese: 世界有許多美麗的地方和不同的文化可以探索。

examples.english: Learning new skills can open up a whole new world of opportunities.
examples.chinese: 學習新技能可以開啟一個充滿機會的全新世界。

examples.english: For her, her pet dog means the world to her.
examples.chinese: 對她來說，她的寵物狗就是她的全世界。

examples.english: A tiny seed can grow into a beautiful flower. (9 words)
examples.chinese: 一顆小小的種子可以長成一朵美麗的花。

examples.english: Her kind words planted a seed of hope in my heart. (11 words)
examples.chinese: 她親切的話語在我心中種下了希望的種子。

examples.english: Many birds love to eat sunflower seeds in winter. (9 words)
examples.chinese: 許多鳥兒喜歡在冬天吃葵花籽。

examples.english: Are there any other options for this project?
examples.chinese: 這個專案還有其他選擇嗎？

examples.english: We should always respect others, even if they are different.
examples.chinese: 我們應該永遠尊重其他人，即使他們有所不同。

examples.english: Good friends always help each other when facing difficulties.
examples.chinese: 好朋友在面對困難時總是互相幫助。

examples.english: Can you taste the salt in this soup?
examples.chinese: 你嚐得出這湯裡的鹹味嗎？

examples.english: I love the spicy taste of hot pot.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡火鍋的辣味。

examples.english: My sister has good taste in fashion and art.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐對時尚和藝術很有品味。

examples.english: The fresh flowers smell so nice in the room.
examples.chinese: 這些新鮮花朵在房間裡聞起來很香。

examples.english: I can smell something burning in the kitchen.
examples.chinese: 我聞到廚房裡有東西燒焦了。

examples.english: The wonderful smell of coffee woke me up.
examples.chinese: 美妙的咖啡香氣把我叫醒了。

examples.english: Your new project sounds really challenging and exciting.
examples.chinese: 你的新專案聽起來很有挑戰性又令人興奮。

examples.english: I heard a loud sound coming from the kitchen.
examples.chinese: 我聽到一個很大的聲音從廚房傳來。

examples.english: The alarm sounded loudly when there was a fire.
examples.chinese: 當有火災時，警報大聲地響了起來。

examples.english: I feel very excited about the upcoming field trip.
examples.chinese: 我對即將到來的校外教學感到非常興奮。

examples.english: This new fabric feels incredibly soft to the touch.
examples.chinese: 這塊新布料摸起來非常柔軟。

examples.english: Many students feel that learning English is important.
examples.chinese: 許多學生認為學習英文很重要。

examples.english: He lives in a large house with a beautiful garden.
examples.chinese: 他住在一棟有漂亮花園的大房子裡。

examples.english: A large number of students attended the school concert.
examples.chinese: 大量的學生參加了學校的音樂會。

examples.english: The company made a large profit last year.
examples.chinese: 這間公司去年獲得了巨大的利潤。

examples.english: This backpack is too heavy for me to carry.
examples.chinese: 這書包太重了，我背不動。

examples.english: We cancelled our picnic because of heavy rain.
examples.chinese: 我們因為大雨取消了野餐。

examples.english: Doing this homework feels like a heavy burden.
examples.chinese: 寫這份功課感覺像個沉重的負擔。

examples.english: Let's try to solve this math problem together.
examples.chinese: 我們一起試著解決這個數學問題吧。

examples.english: Why don't we try this new board game tonight?
examples.chinese: 我們今晚何不試試這個新的桌遊呢？

examples.english: Have you tried bubble tea from that shop?
examples.chinese: 你有試過那家店的珍珠奶茶嗎？

examples.english: I enjoy sitting on this soft cushion; it's very comfortable.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡坐在這個軟坐墊上，它很舒適。

examples.english: When I'm with my family, I always feel comfortable and safe.
examples.chinese: 當我跟家人在一起時，我總是感到舒適又安全。

examples.english: It took some time, but she felt comfortable speaking in front of the class.
examples.chinese: 花了一些時間，但她終於感覺在班級面前說話很自在。

examples.english: The school fair was very successful, raising a lot of money.
examples.chinese: 學校園遊會很成功，募得許多錢。

examples.english: He worked hard to become a successful doctor.
examples.chinese: 他努力工作，成為一名成功的醫生。

examples.english: Their plan to win the game was quite successful.
examples.chinese: 他們贏得比賽的計畫相當成功。

examples.english: Taipei 101 is famous for its unique design.
examples.chinese: 台北101以其獨特的設計而聞名。

examples.english: The young artist became famous very quickly.
examples.chinese: 這位年輕藝術家很快就出名了。

examples.english: Do you know any famous historical sites in Taiwan?
examples.chinese: 你知道台灣有哪些有名的歷史古蹟嗎？

examples.english: She always cares about her younger brother's feelings.
examples.chinese: 她總是關心她弟弟的感受。

examples.english: Do you care for a cup of hot tea after class?
examples.chinese: 下課後你想要來杯熱茶嗎？

examples.english: It's important to take good care of your health.
examples.chinese: 照顧好你的健康很重要。

examples.english: Be careful when you walk on the wet floor, or you might slip.
examples.chinese: 當你在濕地板上走路時要小心，否則你可能會滑倒。

examples.english: Students should be careful to check their answers before turning in the test.
examples.chinese: 學生交考卷前應該小心檢查答案。

examples.english: Please be careful with my camera; it's new and expensive.
examples.chinese: 請小心使用我的相機；它是新的而且很貴。

examples.english: Our new teacher is very friendly to all students.
examples.chinese: 我們的新老師對所有學生都非常友善。

examples.english: This small town is known for its friendly people and quiet streets.
examples.chinese: 這個小鎮以其友善的居民和寧靜的街道聞名。

examples.english: Our team will play a friendly match against their school next week.
examples.chinese: 我們隊下週將和他們學校進行一場友誼賽。

examples.english: I love eating fresh fruit, especially mangoes in summer.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡吃新鮮水果，特別是夏天的芒果。

examples.english: The fresh air in the mountains always makes me feel alive.
examples.chinese: 山上的新鮮空氣總是讓我感到很有精神。

examples.english: Let's take a fresh approach to solve this difficult problem.
examples.chinese: 讓我們用一個新的方法來解決這個困難的問題。

examples.english: I enjoy the sweet taste of fresh fruit every summer.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡每年夏天新鮮水果甜美的滋味。

examples.english: It was so sweet of you to make me breakfast this morning.
examples.chinese: 你今天早上幫我做早餐，真是太貼心了。

examples.english: We had a sweet time together playing games at the party.
examples.chinese: 我們在派對上一起玩遊戲，度過了一段美好的時光。

examples.english: Each team member worked hard for the win.
examples.chinese: 每個隊員都為勝利努力工作。

examples.english: Each of the books on the shelf is new.
examples.chinese: 架上的每本書都是新的。

examples.english: The concert tickets cost five hundred dollars each.
examples.chinese: 演唱會門票每張五百元。

examples.english: The little girl likes to swing high on the playground.
examples.chinese: 小女孩喜歡在操場上盪得很高。

examples.english: My favorite thing at the park is riding on the swing.
examples.chinese: 我在公園最喜歡的事情是盪鞦韆。

examples.english: He can swing a baseball bat really hard.
examples.chinese: 他能很用力地揮舞棒球棒。

examples.english: Be careful not to slide on the wet floor.
examples.chinese: 小心不要在濕地板上滑倒。

examples.english: Children love playing on the slide in the park.
examples.chinese: 孩子們喜歡在公園的溜滑梯上玩。

examples.english: Sales began to slide after the holiday season.
examples.chinese: 假期季節過後，銷售額開始下滑。

examples.english: The little girl likes to hide behind the curtain during games.
examples.chinese: 小女孩玩遊戲時喜歡躲在窗簾後面。

examples.english: He decided to hide his comic book under the bed.
examples.chinese: 他決定把漫畫書藏在床底下。

examples.english: She tried to hide her sadness from her friends after the news.
examples.chinese: 聽到消息後，她試著向朋友隱藏她的悲傷。

examples.english: Let's eat dinner at a new Italian restaurant tonight.
examples.chinese: 我們今晚去一家新的義式餐廳吃晚餐吧。

examples.english: This restaurant offers delicious food and excellent service.
examples.chinese: 這家餐廳提供美味的食物和優質的服務。

examples.english: They decided to open a small restaurant near the park.
examples.chinese: 他們決定在公園附近開一間小餐廳。

examples.english: She accidentally let her phone drop on the floor.
examples.chinese: 她不小心讓她的手機掉落在地板上。

examples.english: The temperature will drop sharply tonight, so wear warm clothes.
examples.chinese: 今晚氣溫會急遽下降，所以要穿暖和的衣服。

examples.english: Water drops from the leaky faucet all night long.
examples.chinese: 水從漏水的水龍頭滴下，滴了一整晚。

examples.english: My family will move to a new house next month.
examples.chinese: 我的家人下個月要搬到新家。

examples.english: His kindness moved me to tears.
examples.chinese: 他的善良讓我感動落淚。

examples.english: Please move your chair so I can sit down.
examples.chinese: 請移動你的椅子，我才能坐下。

examples.english: Please paste this beautiful photo into your school album carefully.
examples.chinese: 請小心地將這張漂亮的照片黏貼到你的學校相簿裡。

examples.english: You can copy text from here and then paste it into your document.
examples.chinese: 你可以從這裡複製文字，然後將它貼到你的文件中。

examples.english: The teacher asked us to paste the warning sign on the classroom door.
examples.chinese: 老師要求我們將警告標誌黏貼在教室門上。

examples.english: My brother hopes to become a famous pilot one day.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥希望有一天能成為一位有名的飛行員。

examples.english: It's important to become a good listener.
examples.chinese: 成為一個好的傾聽者很重要。

examples.english: The small village slowly became a big city.
examples.chinese: 這個小村莊慢慢地變成了一座大城市。

examples.english: There are many small shops around our neighborhood.
examples.chinese: 我們社區附近有很多小商店。

examples.english: The children ran around the tree during playtime.
examples.chinese: 孩子們在遊戲時間繞著樹跑。

examples.english: Let's meet around six o'clock this evening.
examples.chinese: 我們今晚六點左右見面吧。

examples.english: This task is more challenging than I expected.
examples.chinese: 這項任務比我預期的更具挑戰性。

examples.english: We need more volunteers to help with the event.
examples.chinese: 我們需要更多的志工來協助這次活動。

examples.english: It's getting more and more difficult to find quiet places here.
examples.chinese: 在這裡要找到安靜的地方變得越來越困難了。

examples.english: Taipei 101 is the most famous skyscraper in Taiwan.
examples.chinese: 臺北101是臺灣最著名的摩天大樓。

examples.english: Most students in my class enjoy playing basketball.
examples.chinese: 我班上多數學生都喜歡打籃球。

examples.english: He ate most of the pizza for lunch.
examples.chinese: 他午餐吃了大部分的披薩。

examples.english: This is the student whose report was chosen as the best.
examples.chinese: 這是那位報告被選為最好的學生。

examples.english: Whose backpack did you find in the classroom this morning?
examples.chinese: 你今天早上在教室裡找到的是誰的背包？

examples.english: The famous artist, whose paintings are very expensive, visited our school.
examples.chinese: 那位畫作非常昂貴的著名藝術家參觀了我們的學校。

examples.english: This book is much more interesting than the one I read last week.
examples.chinese: 這本書比我上週讀的那本有趣多了。

examples.english: I would rather go hiking than stay home and watch TV.
examples.chinese: 我寧願去爬山也不願待在家看電視。

examples.english: Other than homework, I have no plans for tonight.
examples.chinese: 除了作業之外，我今晚沒有其他計畫。

examples.english: A healthy heart is important for a long life.
examples.chinese: 一顆健康的心臟對長壽很重要。

examples.english: Students should learn the new vocabulary by heart.
examples.chinese: 學生應該將新的詞彙牢牢記住。

examples.english: The store is in the heart of the shopping district.
examples.chinese: 這家店位於購物區的中心地帶。

examples.english: He hurt his right arm while playing basketball.
examples.chinese: 他打籃球時傷到了右手臂。

examples.english: She crossed her arms and waited patiently.
examples.chinese: 她雙手抱胸，耐心等待。

examples.english: He put his hand on the arm of the sofa.
examples.chinese: 他把手放在沙發的扶手上。

examples.english: You should keep your nails clean and trim them often.
examples.chinese: 你應該保持指甲乾淨並經常修剪。

examples.english: Many girls enjoy painting their nails with different colors.
examples.chinese: 很多女生喜歡把她們的指甲塗上不同顏色。

examples.english: Biting your nails is a bad habit for your health.
examples.chinese: 咬指甲是一個對健康不好的壞習慣。

examples.english: She fell and scraped her knee badly during the basketball game.
examples.chinese: 她在籃球比賽中跌倒，膝蓋嚴重擦傷。

examples.english: He got on his knees to tie his shoelaces quickly.
examples.chinese: 他跪下來，趕緊繫好鞋帶。

examples.english: Seeing her favorite singer made her weak at the knees.
examples.chinese: 一看到她最喜歡的歌手，她就感到腿軟。

examples.english: He carried his heavy backpack on his right shoulder.
examples.chinese: 他把沉重的背包背在他的右肩上。

examples.english: As the leader, she must shoulder all the team's challenges.
examples.chinese: 身為隊長，她必須肩負團隊所有的挑戰。

examples.english: The students worked shoulder to shoulder to clean the classroom.
examples.chinese: 學生們肩並肩地合作打掃教室。

examples.english: A large part of the island is covered by forests.
examples.chinese: 島嶼有很大一部分被森林覆蓋。

examples.english: Everyone must do their part to protect the environment.
examples.chinese: 每個人都必須盡自己的一份力來保護環境。

examples.english: This engine part needs to be replaced immediately.
examples.chinese: 這個引擎零件需要立刻更換。

examples.english: Since we've walked so far, let's take a short rest now.
examples.chinese: 既然我們已經走了這麼遠，現在就小憩片刻吧。

examples.english: When you feel tired, you should rest for a while.
examples.chinese: 當你感到疲倦時，你應該休息一下。

examples.english: She looks tired, so she really needs some rest.
examples.chinese: 她看起來很累，所以她真的需要休息。
